name: 郭五鳳
objective: This course is meticulously designed to enhance undergraduate students' understanding and proficiency in leveraging marketing research for informed decision-making. The technological advancements of the 21st century, notably the advent of the Google search engine, the proliferation of social media, and the integration of artificial intelligence (AI), have profoundly reshaped our world. Since 2022, generative AI has become a dominant force in human life. Throughout this course, we will explore global market trends and their implications for career advancement. Emphasis will be placed on qualitative marketing research analysis, with in-depth case studies, theoretical frameworks, and methodological applications examined in class.

scorePolicy: Students will engage in team and individual presentations, contributing 30% to the midterm and 40% to the final exam. The remaining 30% of the overall grade will be determined by class attendance.
